name: Dancing Blade: Katteni Momotenshi II: Tears of Eden
overview: Born from a big peach fruit, Momo travels around the world to find the reason for her existence. Accompanying her is a ragtag group of adventurers: a young boy skilled in the ways of magic; the sexy Kijime; the kind and mild-mannered healer Oinu; and the lumbering armored giant Sarukichi, master of an infinite amount of weapons and gadgets. This second game continues on the story from the first Dancing Blade Katteni Momotenshi, where Momohime transformed into Momotenshi for the first time. It's effectively an interactive action-comedy anime that lasts for about 60 minutes. This time the story is about that another village wanted Momo to go with them or it will attack Momo's village she accept to protect the people of the village, but thing will get a lot more complicated than that after the exchange starts. The game features multiple endings depending of the player choices during the gameplay.
